Then, [[refresh the page>>||queryString=]] and check if the numbers check out. confluencepro.metadata.livetable.emptyvalue=- confluencepro.metadata.livetable.doc.title=Title confluencepro.metadata.livetable.executed=Executed confluencepro.metadata.livetable.doc.date=Date confluencepro.metadata.livetable.doc.author=Author confluencepro.metadata.livetable.actions=Actions confluencepro.metadata.welcome=This tool lets you import data from Metadata for Confluence. confluencepro.metadata.intro=First, import your Confluence pages using [[Confluence Migrator Pro>>ConfluenceMigratorPro.WebHome]]. Then, attach the JSON files exported from Metadata for Confluence and run the migrations. confluencepro.metadata.pleaseinstallmetadatapro=But before you can do this, please install [[Metadata Pro>>url:https://store.xwiki.com/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/MetadataPro/]]. confluencepro.metadata.metadataforconfluence=Metadata for Confluence confluencepro.metadata.metadatamigratorpresentation=You can migrate from the Metadata for Confluence plugin with the [[Metadata migration tool>>ConfluenceMigratorPro.Metadata.WebHome]]. Support for other metadata plugins may come in the future.
